example.text: Title 42 is less than 24hrs from ending and Border Patrol is now apprehending 10,000 migrants per day—the highest ever recorded. What is Joe Biden or our “border czar” Kamala Harris doing about this? Short answer: Nothing [[url]]

I was joined in my call for an offshore wind activity moratorium by Congressmen Chris Smith (NJ-4), Jeff Van Drew (NJ-2), and a group of 30 bipartisan mayors along the mid-Atlantic. My joint statement with Rep. Van Drew can be read here.

Today, with the passage of HRes. 363, we honored the memory of local Officer Glenn Hilliard, who was killed in the line of duty as he pursued a criminal. Officers who risk their lives for our safety deserve our honor, support, and to be fully funded. #NationalPoliceWeek [[url]]
